name: Dynamic Toe Touch with Back Arch
description: Feet astride, arms upward. Touch floor with bounce, then stretch upward into backward bend. Knees may bend slightly to avoid strain. Continuous fluid motion.
illustration: Search: '5BX Chart 2 Exercise 1 toe touch back arch'

name: Anchored Full Sit-Up
description: Back lying, feet 6" apart. Sit up to vertical position with feet optionally anchored. Slight knee bend permitted. Full range of motion required.

name: Classic Superman Hold
description: Front lying with palms under thighs. Simultaneously lift head, shoulders, and both straight legs until thighs clear palms. Isometric hold at peak position.
illustration: Search: 'Superman exercise palms under thighs variation'

name: Military Standard Push-Up
description: Front plank position. Lower body until chest touches floor with elbows at 45째 angle. Full arm extension required on ascent. Maintain straight line from heels to head.

name: Astride Run with Jumping Jacks
description: Alternate between stationary astride run with 4-inch foot elevation and full-range jumping jacks. Maintain rhythm and form during transitions.
illustration: Search: 'RCAF astride run jumping jack combo'

name: Standard Astride Run
description: Maintain 4-inch foot elevation during stationary run. Counts based on left foot contacts. Prepares for jump intervals.

name: Military Astride Jumps
description: Full-range jumping jacks: arms raise sideways to shoulder height, feet spread wider than shoulder width. Strict return to starting position.

name: Lateral Toe Touch Sequence
description: Feet astride. Alternate touching 6" outside left/between/outside right foot, followed by full backward bend. Direction reverses halfway through set.

name: Hands-Behind-Head Sit-Up
description: Back lying with hands clasped behind head. Sit up to vertical while maintaining foot contact. Anchoring permitted only if necessary.

name: Interlocked Superman
description: Front lying with hands clasped behind back. Lift chest and legs simultaneously, maintaining straight legs and full upper/lower body clearance from floor.

name: Three-Point Cobra Push-Up
description: Chin-to-floor -> forehead-to-floor -> push-up sequence. Distinct pauses at each position. No continuous motion permitted.

name: Elevated Step Run into Half Squat
description: Alternate between 4-inch step run and 110째 knee bend squats. Transition smoothly between exercises, maintaining rhythm and form.
illustration: Search: '5BX elevated step run half squat combo'

name: Elevated Step Run
description: Continuous stationary run maintaining consistent 4-inch foot lift. Foundation for squat interval training.

name: Half Knee Bend Squats
description: Precise 110째 knee bends with hands on hips. Maintain upright torso and full foot contact. No forward lean permitted.

name: Overhead Arm Circle Toe Touch
description: Lateral toe touches combined with continuous overhead arm circles during backbend. Full 360째 arm rotation past vertical required.

name: Straight-Leg Toe Reach Sit-Up
description: Back lying with arms overhead. Sit up while maintaining straight legs and arm-head contact. Toe touch required at peak position.

name: T-Superman Hold
description: Front lying with arms extended sideways. Lift chest and legs while maintaining T-arm position. Full body clearance from floor required.

name: Wide-Grip Chest Press-Up
description: Hands positioned 12" from ears. Full chest-to-floor contact required. Emphasizes pectoral major engagement.

name: High-Knee into Squat Jump
description: Alternate between waist-high knee run and squat jumps. Transition smoothly between exercises, maintaining rhythm and form.
illustration: Search: '5BX high knee run squat jump combo'

name: High-Knee Sustained Run
description: Waist-high knee lift during stationary run. Each left foot contact counts as one step. Base for footwork drills.

name: Alternating Semi-Squat Jumps
description: Half-crouch jumps with alternating foot positions. Requires mid-air foot position change and controlled landing.

name: Trifecta Forward Bend
description: Feet astride, hands clasped. Sequence: floor touch -> left knee touch -> right knee touch -> full backbend. Continuous motion cycle.

name: Kneeling Elbow Floor Touch
description: From kneeling position, forward bend until elbows touch floor. Maintain seated heel contact throughout movement.

name: Prone Chest Elevation
description: Front lying with head on hands. Lift upper torso while keeping legs straight. Focus on thoracic extension.

name: Cobra Push-Back
description: Push-up to upward dog position with exaggerated back arch and head lift. Maintain straight leg alignment.

name: High-Knee into Spread Jump
description: Alternate between waist-high knee run and spread eagle jumps. Transition smoothly between exercises, maintaining rhythm and form.
illustration: Search: '5BX high knee run spread jump combo'

name: Waist-High Knee Run
description: Stationary run requiring knee elevation to waist level. Strict step counting via left foot contacts.

name: Spread Eagle Stance Jumps
description: From crouch position, jump to spread stance with overhead arm swing. Requires audible foot contact on landing.

name: Reverse Grip Lateral Flex
description: Reverse clasp grip overhead. Lateral floor touches with mid-line press, followed by circular backbend. Direction reversal at midpoint.

name: V-Up Toe Tap
description: Simultaneous leg/arm lift to V-position. Requires finger-to-toe contact with full back/leg clearance from floor.

name: Superman Press Pulse
description: Overhead arm position during Superman. Additional backward press at peak position. Full anterior chain engagement.

name: Plyometric Chest Tap Push-Up
description: Explosive push-up with mid-air chest slap. Audible contact required. Maintain rigid plank position during flight phase.

name: High-Knee Jack Jump Combo
description: Alternate between waist-high knee run and toe-touch jack jumps. Transition smoothly between exercises, maintaining rhythm and form.
illustration: Search: '5BX high knee run jack jump combo'

name: Sustained High-Knee Run
description: Continuous waist-high knee running. Maintain upright posture and consistent rhythm.

name: Toe-Touch Jack Jumps
description: Squat jump with mid-air toe touch at waist height. Requires straight legs and audible hand-foot contact.
illustration: Search: '5BX jack jump toe touch diagram'
